---
id: cancel-payment-intent
title: "Cancel payment intent."
description: "Cancel payment intent. Available in general if authorizationStatus is NEW. This method is also available for payments initiated by the PAY_LATER payment method, but only if the status is CUSTOMER_CREATION_IN_PROGRESS."
sidebar_label: "Cancel payment intent."
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: docs/api/tatrapayplus-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel payment intent."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/payments/{payment-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancel payment intent. Available in general if authorizationStatus is NEW. This method is also available for payments initiated by the PAY_LATER payment method, but only if the status is CUSTOMER_CREATION_IN_PROGRESS.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"payment-id","in":"path","description":"payment intent identifier\n","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"required":true},{"name":"X-Request-ID","in":"header","description":"ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.","required":true,"example":"99391c7e-ad88-49ec-a2ad-99ddcb1f7721","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
